sub_title: PhD candidate at Vrije Universitiet Amsterdam
summary: I am a PhD candidate within the project "Engaged scholarship and narratives of change in a comparative perspective" under the guidance of professor Halleh Ghorashi at the Vrije University Amsterdam. My contribution targets the co-operation of academics and society in South Africa towards the societal inclusion of refugees. Furthermore, as a team member, I compared my case with The Netherlands and the USA.

awards: [{'title': 'Special Mention IDleaks Thesis Award', 'description': 'I received a Special Mention for my master thesis \'(E)motion of Saudade: The Embodiment of Solidarity in the Cuban Medical Cooperation in Mozambique\' The jury honred the thesis with the following words: "As a jury, we have found Ocadiz Arriaga’s work exciting and engaging. At its core, this multi-layered analysis raises important questions and teases themes central to development studies and discourses. It engages with these critically, drawing on an array of references that span disciplinary divides. Furthermore, the form of the thesis is refreshing, original and, in its reflexive nature, inherently postcolonial."  ', 'issuer': 'IDleaks', 'date': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, {'title': 'Honorable Mention, “Mujer migrante, cuéntame tu historia"', 'description': 'My short story "Las simples cosas" narrates my experience as a migrant through different continents, reflecting on the internl and external journeys that allows us to glimpse a human essence behind the diversity of our hectic reality. ', 'issuer': 'National Institute for Women, Mexico', 'date': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': 'Uhlenbeck scholarship', 'description': 'Scholarship programm from the Faculty of Humanities to perform six months of fieldwork (four months in Mozambique and two in Cuba)', 'issuer': 'Leiden University', 'date': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, {'title': 'Leiden University Excellence Scholarship (LExS)', 'description': 'A highly competitive scholarship for Non-European students to complete a full-time master at Leiden University', 'issuer': 'Leiden University', 'date': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}]
